statements: DELETE FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE id = 1 AND device_id = 101;
DELETE FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Critical' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE device_id IN (SELECT id FROM devices WHERE status = 'disabled');
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 2 AND notification_type = 'alert';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE is_active = FALSE);
DELETE FROM devices WHERE location = 'Office' AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 5 AND device_id = 3;
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE end_date < CURDATE());
DELETE FROM notifications_log WHERE status = 'archived' AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
